duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist pharmacists with dispensing processes, handle patient orders, and communicate with patients.
Process prescription orders, communicate with prescribers and patients, and dispense prescription orders.
Support patient education pharmacists and develop appropriate materials.
Respond to patient and coworker inquiries or concerns about prescriptions and orders.
Ensure timely processing of patient orders and shipments, compliance with pharmacy documentation, data entry, and regulatory agency guidelines.
Maintain active licensure status and compliance with FDA mandates, manufacturer restrictions, and various regulations.
Develop and maintain positive working relationships with pharmacy staff and network partners to ensure a team approach to pharmacy services.
Meet patient service quality standards and uphold the core values of the pharmacy.
May perform any additional responsibilities or special projects as required, subject to change based upon the needs of the department.

education_certification.credential: Active, Registered and unrestricted Pharmacy Technicians licensed in the State of Florida
